display_long_description:
🌍 **Build vibrant living worlds - no art experience required!**

🦌 **Then become a pudu and run through those worlds!**

**We just released our January update, and your world got bigger! 🌍 Use the pudu tool to shrink down to size to run, jump, and explore the worlds you build! 

✨✨✨

Welcome to Cozy Worlds, a soothing world-builder where anyone can craft living landscapes - no art experience required! Sculpt floating terrain and fill it with vibrant plants, cute critters and enchanting natural elements.

[media]

Shrink down to size and explore the worlds you build!

[media]

**Unlock a growing Creative Library!**

From ancient fortresses to delicate flowers, access 80+ design elements to make your creation unique!

**Natural Toolkit to Build Your World**

Paint and erase terrain, interact with living elements, and customize your creation with an intuitive and forest-inspired toolkit.

**Two Creative Modes To Find Your Vibe**

Journey through World-Builder Mode to unlock decor and tools - then try Creative Mode to sculpt with no restrictions and total freedom.

**About Cozy Worlds Early Access**

Expect more journeys, elements, and animal friends in future updates. For now, we hope this experience sparks joy and leaves you feeling a bit lighter!

**Join the Cozy Community?**

Connect + share with fellow builders on our Discord! discord.gg/fbAvagsC8r
